purpleculture_pinyin:
pī
to hack; to chop; to split open; (of lightning) to strike
взломать; мелко нарезать; расколоть; (молнии) ударить

pǐ
to split in two; to divide
разделить на две части; делить
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 辟 indicates the sound; 刀 (knife) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
劈头盖脸 [ pī tóu gài liǎn ]: lit. splitting the head and covering the face (idiom); fig. pelting (with rain etc); showering down
劈面 [ pī miàn ]: right in the face
劈手 [ pī shǒu ]: with a lightning move of the hand
劈啪 [ pī pā ]: (onom.) for crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
劈柴 [ pī chái ]: to chop firewood; to split logs
劈柴 [ pǐ chái ]: chopped wood; firewood
劈叉 [ pǐ chà ]: the splits (move in dancing); to do the splits; Taiwan pr. [pi3 cha1]
劈腿 [ pǐ tuǐ ]: to do the splits (gymnastics); (Tw) two-timing (in romantic relationships); Taiwan pr. [pi1 tui3]

heisig_chinese_memo: Those darn hot sauce packets are so annoying to open that sometimes I just split them with my dagger.
Ru_trainchinese:
pī: (предлог/глаг) прямо в (напр., лицо, грудь и т.д.); рубить, раскалывать; ломаться, раскалываться; (о молнии) ударять
pǐ: (глаг) разводить ноги или пальцы как можно шире; отламывать; сдирать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: as a rule (辟) a sword (刀) could tear anything
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Those darn hot sauce packets are so annoying to open that sometimes I just split them with my dagger.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " knife " and " pi ", the original meaning is to break with a knife, axe, etc. "Shuowen": "Broken. From the knife to the sound." Tang Baijuyi "From the Shu River to the Dongting Lake": "The long wave is smashing like a smash, and the mountains are like cutting."

" Chop " can mean split. Tang Zhangzi "Snow Poem": "Do you know that people who are hungry and cold have their hands and feet chopped."

" Chop " can also mean directing. "Water Margin" Chapter 41: "Suddenly I saw a boat on the river. A person had passed under the water. He hugged Huang Wenbing by his waist, grabbed his head, and pulled him onto the boat. The big man on the boat came early to meet him, so he The hemp is tied up."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " sword " and " pi ", the original meaning is to break with a knife, axe, etc.
humanum_full_description:
從「刀」，「辟」聲，本義為用刀、斧等破開。《說文》：「破也。从刀，辟聲。」 唐白居易〈自蜀江至洞庭湖有感而作〉：「長波逐若瀉，連山鑿如劈。」

　　「劈」可表示裂開。唐張孜〈雪詩〉：「豈知饑寒人，手腳生皴劈。」

　　「劈」也可表示沖着。《水滸傳》第41回：「忽見江面上一隻船，水底下早鑽過一個人，把黃文炳劈腰抱住，攔頭揪起，扯上船來。船上那個大漢早來接應，便把麻索綁了。」
humanum_short_description: 從「刀」，「辟」聲，本義為用刀、斧等破開。

Chinese: Those darn hot sauce packets are so annoying to open that sometimes I just split them with my dagger.
Meaning: split
Story: Those darn hot sauce packets are so annoying to open that sometimes I just split them with my dagger.
Kind: both

從「 刀 」，「 辟 」聲，本義為用刀、斧等破開。《說文》：「破也。从刀，辟聲。」 唐白居易〈自蜀江至洞庭湖有感而作〉：「長波逐若瀉，連山鑿如劈。」 「 劈 」可表示裂開。唐張孜〈雪詩〉：「豈知饑寒人，手腳生皴劈。」 「 劈 」也可表示沖着。《水滸傳》第41回：「忽見江面上一隻船，水底下早鑽過一個人，把黃文炳劈腰抱住，攔頭揪起，扯上船來。船上那個大漢早來接應，便把麻索綁了。」
From the sound of " knife" and " pi", the original meaning is to break with a knife, axe, etc. "Shuowen": "Broken. From the knife to the sound." Tang Baijuyi "From the Shu River to the Dongting Lake": "The long wave is smashing like a smash, and the mountains are like cutting." " Chop" can mean split. Tang Zhangzi "Snow Poem": "Do you know that people who are hungry and cold have their hands and feet chopped." " Chop" can also mean directing. "Water Margin" Chapter 41: "Suddenly I saw a boat on the river. A person had passed under the water. He hugged Huang Wenbing by his waist, grabbed his head, and pulled him onto the boat. The big man on the boat came early to meet him, so he The hemp is tied up."

劈字的基本解释

劈
pī
用刀斧或强力破开：劈杀。劈刺。劈成两半。
雷电击坏或击毙：天打雷劈。
冲着，正对着：劈头盖脑。
两个斜面合成的纵截面呈三角形的简单机械，刀、斧、楔子等各种切削工具的刃都属于这一类（亦称“尖劈”）。

劈
pǐ
分开：劈柴。劈成三股。
分裂，使从原物上分开：把菜帮儿劈下来。
腿或手指等过分叉开：劈叉。

劈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pī］
［《廣韻》普擊切，入錫，滂。］
(1)破开。
(2)裂；裂开。
(3)割；划破。参见“劈面”。
(4)砍；杀。
(5)俗称雷击为“劈”。
(6)正对着；冲着。
(7)犹辨。
(8)象声词。形容拍击、爆裂之声。
(9)以手掌拍击。
(10)方言。谓不能自持。
(11)方言。嘶哑。
(12)击剑运动术语。佩剑基本攻击技术之一。有直劈、反手劈、斜劈三个基本手法。
(13)方言。订立。
(14)物理学用语。由两个斜面合成，纵面呈三角形的简单机械。也称“楔”、“尖劈”。刀、斧、刨、凿等一类切削工具的刃都是劈。
[②]［pǐ］
(1)掰开；撕开。
(2)分配。
(3)扭伤。

劈字的英文翻译

◎ 劈
cleave, hack, hag, hew, rip

劈字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　劈； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页144第38
【唐韻】普擊切【集韻】【韻會】匹歷切，?音霹。【說文】破也。从刀，辟聲。【玉篇】裂破也。【廣韻】割也。【集韻】分也。

劈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

劈字的起名意思

暂无。

hack
Basic explanation of words
hack
pī
Break open with a knife or axe or force: hack and kill. bayonet fighting. Split in half.
Lightning strikes broken or killed: the sky strikes thunder.
Pointing, facing: smashing the head.
A simple machine with a triangular longitudinal section composed of two inclined surfaces. The blades of various cutting tools such as knives, axes, wedges, etc. belong to this category (also known as "splits").
hack
pǐ
Separate: Chopping wood. Split into three strands.
Split, separate from the original: split the vegetable gang.
Legs or fingers are split too far: splits.
hack
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pī］
["Guang Yun" general blow cut, into the tin, pounding. ]
(1) Break open.
(2) Crack; split.
(3) Cut; cut. See "split surface".
(4) Cut; kill.
(5) Lightning strikes are commonly known as "splitting".
(6) Directly facing; directed at.
(7) Still distinguished.
(8) Onomatopoeia. Describes the sound of flapping and popping.
(9) Slap with palms.
(10) Dialects. It means that you can't sustain yourself.
(11) Dialects. hoarse.
(12) Terminology of fencing sport. Sabre is one of the basic attack techniques. There are three basic techniques: straight split, backhand split, and diagonal split.
(13) Dialects. Conclude.
(14) Physics terms. A simple machine composed of two inclined planes and a triangular vertical plane. It is also called "wedge" and "snap". The blades of cutting tools such as knives, axes, planers, and chisels are all splits.
[②] [pǐ]
(1) Break apart; tear apart.
(2) Distribution.
(3) Sprain.
hack

hack
Name meaning
Nothing.
pī, pǐ
I pī
1) колоть, раскалывать, расщеплять, рубить на щепки; вскрывать (ножом)
劈木柴 колоть дрова
劈竹 расщеплять бамбук
2) колоться, щепиться, трескаться
这根竹竿劈了 этот бамбуковый шест расщепился
3) клин; клиновидный
尖劈 острый клин
4) напротив, прямо (в упор, в лицо)
劈胸一把抓住 схватить прямо за грудь
5) расколоть ударом молнии, как громом пораженный
II pǐ
1) делить, разделять; разлагать
劈成三股 разделить на три части
劈因数 мат. разлагать (разложение) на множители
2) срывать, обрывать (напр., листья)
3) разводить (ноги, руки)
